articles.title: About Me
articles.description: I might be young, but here's an overview of my life so far...
articles.contents:
Contents
Education
The University of Melbourne
Trinity College Foundation Studies
Wesley College Glen Waverley

National Service

Education
The University of Melbourne
2021 - Present:
Student at the University of Melbourne majoring in Actuarial Science under the Bachelor of Commerce. Also an events officer for the Singapore Students Society on the 2021/2022 committee.

Trinity College Foundation Studies




2018:
Transferred to Trinity College for my final year of high school. I took electives Mathematics 1, Mathematics 2 and Accounting. The choice of these electives were made with the intent of meeting the requirements for the bachelor of commerce at the University of Melbourne

Wesley College Glen Waverley




2013 - 2017:
I attended Wesley College after moving over to Australia from Singapore. Here I was exposed to a new approach and philosophy towards studying and learning, with an emphasis on being self driven and being resourceful in how to find information.


National Service




2019 - 2021:
After high school I returned to Singpore to complete my 2 years of national service. I was enlisted into the Police force and completed the Police Officers Basic Training before being posted to the Protective Security Command. There I commissioned as an Insitu-Reaction Team (IRT) Trooper after completing additional training. The IRT was first introduced in December 2017 as a quick reaction force on the ground geared towards neutralising armed threats. High-visibility foot patrols are conducted at locations with high human traffic, deterring any potential attacks by projecting a strong police presence in the area.
